tool.name: Add ClinVar Annotations VCF
tool.description: Include INFO annotations from ClinVar VCF in your VCF.

param.name: resource_lbl
param.label: Resource VCF label, to be used in annotation resource_lbl.info

param.name: info
param.label: Resource VCF label.
param.help: Will be placed in output file annotation.

tool.help:
usage: add_clinvar_vcf.py [-h] [--input INPUT] [--output OUTPUT] [--info [INFO [INFO ...]]] [--resource RESOURCE] [--resource_lbl RESOURCE_LBL] [--version]
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --input INPUT Input VCF to annotate with ClinVar. --output OUTPUT Output VCF --info [INFO [INFO ...]] INFO annotation to pull. --resource RESOURCE Resource VCF --resource_lbl RESOURCE_LBL Resource VCF Label --version show program's version number and exit
